changeSet.author: Christopher Tubbs

column.name: proj4
column.remarks: The proj4 parameters used for the projection

column.name: srtext
column.remarks: The text parameters used to describe the projection

column.name: projection_mapping
column.remarks: The type of mapping for used for the projection

column.name: x_resolution
column.remarks: The resolution of the x units

column.name: y_resolution
column.remarks: The resolutions of the y units

column.name: x_unit
column.remarks: The unit of measurement used to describe the x units

column.name: y_unit
column.remarks: The unit of measurement used to describe the y units

column.name: x_type
column.remarks: The coordinate type used for the x units (such as GeoX)

column.name: y_type
column.remarks: The coordinate type used for the y units (such as GeoY)

column.name: x_size
column.remarks: The size of the x coordinate axis

column.name: y_size
column.remarks: The size of the y coordinate axis

column.name: load_complete
column.remarks: Whether or not all points for the projection have been saved.
